title: Foundations of Data-Driven Modeling for Predicting Bladder Cancer Recurrence

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused education for working professionals, with mandatory digital device utilization

learning_goals: Learners can design survival analysis models by integrating digital pathology and clinical data.
Learners can explain the fundamental principles of deep learning-based image analysis (segmentation, selection, classification).
Learners understand methodologies for comparing model performance using the AUC (Area Under the Curve) metric.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
